properties.description: Run dataflow with Explicit copy to ingest copy source
Connection to your source data store.

transformations.name: MapDriftProduct
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as double,
		ListPrice as double,
		Size as string,
		Weight as double,
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as date,
		SellEndDate as date,
		DiscontinuedDate as date,
		ThumbNailPhoto as string,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Product
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ProductCategory
source(output(
		ProductDescriptionID as integer,
		Description as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ProductDescription
source(output(
		ProductModelID as integer,
		Name as string,
		CatalogDescription as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ProductModel
source(output(
		ProductModelID as integer,
		ProductDescriptionID as integer,
		Culture as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ProductModelProductDescription
ProductModelProductDescription, ProductDescription join(ProductModelProductDescription@ProductDescriptionID == ProductDescription@ProductDescriptionID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProdDescandProdModProdDesc
Product, ProductCategory join(Product@ProductCategoryID == ProductCategory@ProductCategoryID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProdandProdCat
ProductModel, JoinProdandProdCat join(ProductModel@ProductModelID == Product@ProductModelID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProdModandProdProdCat
JoinProdModandProdProdCat, JoinProdDescandProdModProdDesc join(ProductModel@ProductModelID == ProductModelProductDescription@ProductModelID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProduct
JoinProduct select(mapColumn(
		ProductModelID = ProductModel@ProductModelID,
		ProductDescriptionID = ProductDescription@ProductDescriptionID,
		ProductCategoryID = Product@ProductCategoryID,
		ProductID,
		ProductModelID = ProductModel@ProductModelID,
		ModelName = ProductModel@Name,
		CatalogDescription,
		ProductName = Product@Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Size,
		Weight,
		SellStartDateID = SellStartDate,
		SellEndDateID = SellEndDate,
		DiscontinuedDateID = DiscontinuedDate,
		ModifiedDateID = Product@ModifiedDate,
		ProductCategoryName = ProductCategory@Name,
		Culture,
		Description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProduct
SelectProduct pivot(groupBy(Description),
	pivotBy(Culture),
	DescriptionCulture = max(Description),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: false) ~> PivotProduct
PivotProduct derive(DescriptionCultureAr = toString(byName('DescriptionCulturear    ')),
		DescriptionCultureEn = toString(byName('DescriptionCultureen    ')),
		DescriptionCultureFr = toString(byName('DescriptionCulturefr    ')),
		DescriptionCultureHe = toString(byName('DescriptionCulturehe    ')),
		DescriptionCultureTh = toString(byName('DescriptionCultureth    ')),
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht} = toString(byName('DescriptionCulturezh-cht'))) ~> MapDriftProduct
MapDriftProduct, SelectProduct join(PivotProduct@Description == SelectProduct@Description,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProduct1
JoinProduct1 aggregate(groupBy(ProductID),
	DescriptionCultureAr = max(DescriptionCultureAr),
		{DescriptionCultureEn    } = max(DescriptionCultureEn),
		{DescriptionCultureFr   } = max(DescriptionCultureFr),
		DescriptionCultureHe = max(DescriptionCultureHe),
		DescriptionCultureTh = max(DescriptionCultureTh),
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht} = max({DescriptionCultureZh-cht})) ~> AggProdDesc
AggProdDesc, SelectProduct join(AggProdDesc@ProductID == SelectProduct@ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProduct2
JoinProduct2 select(mapColumn(
		ProductID = SelectProduct@ProductID,
		ProductModelID,
		ProductDescriptionID,
		DescriptionCultureAr,
		{DescriptionCultureEn    },
		{DescriptionCultureFr   },
		DescriptionCultureHe,
		DescriptionCultureTh,
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht},
		ProductCategoryID,
		ModelName,
		ProductName,
		ProductCategoryName,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		Size,
		ListPrice,
		StandardCost,
		Weight,
		SellStartDateID,
		SellEndDateID,
		DiscontinuedDateID,
		ModifiedDateID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProduct2
SelectProduct2 aggregate(groupBy(ProductID,
		ProductModelID,
		ProductCategoryID,
		ModelName,
		ProductName,
		Color,
		ProductNumber,
		ProductCategoryName,
		Size,
		ListPrice,
		StandardCost,
		Weight,
		SellEndDateID,
		SellStartDateID,
		DiscontinuedDateID,
		ModifiedDateID),
	DescriptionCultureAr = max(DescriptionCultureAr),
		{DescriptionCultureEn    } = max({DescriptionCultureEn    }),
		{DescriptionCultureFr    } = max({DescriptionCultureFr   }),
		DescriptionCultureHe = max(DescriptionCultureHe),
		DescriptionCultureTh = max(DescriptionCultureTh),
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht} = max({DescriptionCultureZh-cht})) ~> AggProduct
AggProduct sink(input(
		ProductID as integer,
		ModelName as string,
		ProductName as string,
		Color as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		ProductCategoryName as string,
		Size as string,
		ListPrice as decimal(8,2),
		StandardCost as decimal(8,2),
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		SellEndDateID as timestamp,
		SellStartDateID as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDateID as timestamp,
		ModifiedDateID as timestamp,
		DescriptionCultureAr as string,
		DescriptionCultureEn as string,
		DescriptionCultureFr as string,
		DescriptionCultureHe as string,
		DescriptionCultureTh as string,
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		ModelName,
		ProductName,
		Color,
		ProductNumber,
		ProductCategoryName,
		Size,
		ListPrice,
		StandardCost,
		Weight,
		SellEndDateID,
		SellStartDateID,
		DiscontinuedDateID,
		ModifiedDateID,
		DescriptionCultureAr,
		DescriptionCultureEn = {DescriptionCultureEn    },
		DescriptionCultureFr = {DescriptionCultureFr    },
		DescriptionCultureHe,
		DescriptionCultureTh,
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkProductDimension

content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'Customer_Dim' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'adventureworks_schema')
CREATE TABLE adventureworks_schema.Customer_Dim
	(
	 [CustomerID] bigint,
	 [Title] nvarchar(8),
	 [FirstName] nvarchar(50),
	 [MiddleName] nvarchar(50),
	 [LastName] nvarchar(50),
	 [Suffix] nvarchar(10),
	 [CompanyName] nvarchar(128),
	 [SalesPerson] nvarchar(256),
	 [EmailAddress] nvarchar(50),
	 [Phone] nvarchar(25),
	 [PasswordHash] varchar(128),
	 [PasswordSalt] varchar(10),
	 [ModifiedDate] datetime2(0)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	)
GO

COPY INTO adventureworks_schema.Customer_Dim
(CustomerID 1, Title 3, FirstName 4, MiddleName 5, LastName 6, Suffix 7, CompanyName 8, SalesPerson 9, EmailAddress 10, Phone 11, PasswordHash 12, PasswordSalt 13, ModifiedDate 15)
FROM 'https://adlgen2gradjhb.dfs.core.windows.net/dladventureworks/datalake/SalesLTCustomer'


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM adventureworks_schema.Customer_Dim

TRUNCATE TABLE adventureworks_schema.Date_Dim

DECLARE @CurrentDate DATE = '2010-05-01'
DECLARE @EndDate DATE = '2020-12-31'

WHILE @CurrentDate < @EndDate
BEGIN
INSERT INTO [adventureworks_schema].[Date_Dim](
[DateID]
,[Date]
,[Day]
,[Month]
,[Quarter]
,[Year]
)
SELECT [DateID] = @CurrentDate,
[Date] = @CurrentDate,
[Day] = DAY(@CurrentDate),
[Month] = MONTH(@CurrentDate),
[Quarter] = DATEPART(q, @CurrentDate),
[Year] = YEAR(@CurrentDate)
SET @CurrentDate = DATEADD(DD, 1, @CurrentDate)
END

SELECT * from adventureworks_schema.Date_Dim

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = '[ProductCategory_Dim]' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = '[adventureworks_schema]')
CREATE TABLE [adventureworks_schema].[ProductCategory_Dim]
	(
	 [ProductCategoryID] int,
	 [ParentProductCategoryID] int,
	 [Name] nvarchar(50),
	 [ModifiedDate] datetime
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--BEGIN

(ProductCategoryID 1, ParentProductCategoryID 2, Name 3, ModifiedDate 5)
FROM 'https://adlgen2gradjhb.dfs.core.windows.net/dladventureworks/datalake/SalesLTProductCategory'
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [adventureworks_schema].[ProductCategory_Dim]

ShipDateID 5, ModifiedDateID 22, OnlineOrderFlag 7, SubTotal 16, TaxAmt 17, Freight 18, TotalDue 19)

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = '[SalesOrderHeader_Fact]' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = '[adventureworks_schema]')
CREATE TABLE [adventureworks_schema].[SalesOrderHeader_Fact]
	(
	 [SalesOrderID] int,
	 [CustomerID] int,

	 [TotalDue] MONEY

WITH

	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,

COPY INTO [adventureworks_schema].[SalesOrderHeader_Fact]
(SalesOrderID 1, CustomerID 11, ShipToAddressID 12, BillToAddressID 13, OrderDateID 3, DueDateID 4, ShipDateID 5, ModifiedDateID 22, OnlineOrderFlag 7, SubTotal 16, TaxAmt 17, Freight 18, TotalDue 19)

CREATE TABLE [adventureworks_schema].[Date_Dim]
(
    [DateID] INT NOT NULL,
    [Date] DATE NOT NULL,
    [Day] TINYINT NOT NULL,
    [Month] TINYINT NOT NULL,
    [Year] INT NOT NULL,
    [Quarter] TINYINT NOT NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = '[ProductMod]' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = '[ext]')

	 [SellEndDateID] datetime2(0),
	 [DiscontinuedDateID] nvarchar(4000),
	 [ThumbnailPhotoFileName] nvarchar(4000),
	 [ModifiedDateID] DATETIME2(0)
	)
WITH

	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 HEAP

CREATE TABLE [adventureworks_schema].[SalesOrderDetail_Fact]
(
    [SalesOrderID]	int	NOT NULL,
    [SalesOrderDetailID]	int	NOT NULL,

    [ProductID]	int	NOT NULL,
    [UnitPrice]	money NOT NULL,	
    [UnitPriceDiscount]	money	NOT NULL,
    [LineTotal] MONEY	NOT NULL,	
    [ModifiedDate]	datetime NOT NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);
COPY INTO [adventureworks_schema].[SalesOrderDetail_Fact]
(SalesOrderID 1, SalesOrderDetailID 2, OrderQty 3,ProductID 4
,UnitPrice 5, UnitPriceDiscount 6, LineTotal 7, ModifiedDate 9)

SELECT * from [adventureworks_schema].[SalesOrderDetail_Fact]

	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,

--CREATE PROC bulk_load_[ProductCat]
--AS
--BEGIN

(ProductDescriptionID, Description)
SELECT [ProductDescriptionID], [Description]
FROM [adventureworks_schema].[ProductDescription_Dim]
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [ext].[ProductDesc]
GO
SELECT * FROM [adventureworks_schema].[SalesOrderHeader_Fact]

SELECT TOP (100) [DateID]
,[Date]
,[Day]
,[Month]
,[Year]
,[Quarter]
 FROM [adventureworks_schema].[Date_Dim]
 ORDER BY [Date]

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'Product_Description_Dim' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'adventureworks_schema')
CREATE TABLE adventureworks_schema.Product_Dim
    (
     [ProductDescriptionID] bigint,
     [Description] nvarchar(400),
     [ModifiedDate] datetime
    )
WITH
    (
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
    )
GO 

 

COPY INTO adventureworks_schema.Product_Description_Dim
(ProductDescriptionID 1, Description 2, ModifiedDate 4)
FROM 'https://adlgen2gradjhb.blob.core.windows.net/dladventureworks/datalake/SalesLTProductDescription'

GO

SELECT ProductID, ProductName, ProductNumber, Color, StandardCost, ListPrice,
    Size, Weight, P.ProductCategoryID, ProductCategoryName, P.ProductModelID, ProductModelName, 
    PD.ProductDescriptionID, DescriptionAr, DescriptionEn, DescriptionFr, DescriptionHe, 
    DescriptionTh, DescriptionZh-cht, SellStartDateID, SellEndDateID, 
    DiscontinuedDateID, ThumbnailPhotoFileName, ModifiedDateID
from ext.Product P
JOIN ext.ProductCat PC on P.ProductCategoryID = PC.ProductCategoryID 
JOIN ext.ProductMod PM on P.ProductModelID = PM.ProductModelID 
JOIN ext.ProductModelProductDescription PMPD on PMPD.ProductModelID = PM.ProductModelID
JOIN ext.ProductDesc PD on PD.ProductDescriptionID = PMPD.ProductDescriptionID   

select ar, he, en, th, fr
from
(
  select Culture, Description
  from ext.ProductModelProductDescription PMPD join ext.ProductDesc PD on PMPD.ProductDescriptionID = PD.ProductDescriptionID
) d
pivot
(
  max(Description)
  for Culture in (ar, he, en, th, fr)
) piv;

SELECT TOP (100) [ProductModelID]
,[ProductModelName]
 FROM [ext].[ProductMod]

DROP TABLE [adventureworks_schema].[Product_Dim]
GO

SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE TABLE [adventureworks_schema].[Product_Dim]
( 
	[ProductID] [int]  NULL,
	[ModelName] [nvarchar](100)  NULL,
	[ProductName] [nvarchar](100)  NULL,
	[Color] [nvarchar](150)  NULL,
	[ProductNumber] [nvarchar](250)  NULL,
	[ProductCategoryName] [nvarchar](250)  NULL,
	[Size] [nvarchar](50)  NULL,
	[ListPrice] [decimal](8,2)  NULL,
	[StandardCost] [decimal](8,2)  NULL,
	[Weight] [decimal](8,2)  NULL,
	[SellEndDateID] [datetime]  NULL,
	[SellStartDateID] [datetime]  NULL,
	[DiscontinuedDateID] [datetime]  NULL,
	[ModifiedDateID] [datetime]  NULL,
	[DescriptionCultureAr] [nvarchar](1000)  NULL,
	[DescriptionCultureEn] [nvarchar](1000)  NULL,
	[DescriptionCultureFr] [nvarchar](1000)  NULL,
	[DescriptionCultureHe] [nvarchar](1000)  NULL,
	[DescriptionCultureTh] [nvarchar](1000)  NULL,
	[DescriptionCultureZh-cht] [nvarchar](1000)  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO
